content: *crochet this terrific jiffy ballerina set for the little dancer pretty leg warmers and a sweater that can be finished as either a cardigan or surplice pullover lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # cjif-balletset corrections applied jul 19 2005 skill level intermediate level 3 size girl s 4 6 8 finished chest measurement 24 26 28 leg warmers one size lion brand jiffy 135yrds/123m 3oz/85g #358 savannah - 4 5 6 balls crochet hooks size i-5 5 5 mm and k-10 5 6 5 mm gauge 8 half_double_crochet = 4 / 10cm with larger hook knit version ballet set legwarmers & sweater knit 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/ballet-set-legwarmers--sweater-knit
